alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greene County through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willard, or 7 miles north of Republic, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Strafford... Ash Grove... Brookline... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Turners... Bois D`arc... Galloway... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
